job_company: 同程网络科技股份有限公司
job_given: 薪资福利好，发展平台大

job_company: 昆仑智汇数据科技（北京）有限公司
job_given: 风口行业，大牛带队，行业**梯队
job_detail: 岗位说明：1. 针对重点工业行业（能源，石化，汽车，钢铁、轮胎等）的智能制造与工业互联网的需求，深入了解业务需求，运用数据分析/数据挖掘技术解决客户的实际问题。2. 基于数据平台产品，建立数据标准、进行数据清洗、建立数据分析、预测或优化模型、并负责与团队一起负责数据分析应用的开发和落地实施。3. 对具有共性的数据分析模型和行业应用进行抽象与研究，支撑数据分析产品的开发和在数据平台的应用。 岗位要求：1. 独立定义和解决工业行业相关的数据分析/数据挖掘问题的能力，具有清晰的系统思维逻辑和共性抽象能力2. 精通数据清洗、统计分析和常用数据挖掘/机器学习算法，有丰富的工业数据分析相关的实际项目经验3. 至少精通一种数据分析语言（如Python, R, MATLAB等），及其相应的算法包（如Python的numpy, pandas, sklearn, tsfresh, matplotlib, seaborn, pyecharts等）4. 有良好的客户沟通、业务咨询、团队合作与项目管理能力5. 有一定程序开发经验（如Python, Web, Java等），熟悉面向对象的设计6. 熟悉常用数据库、大数据、并行化计算等相关技术和工具，如Spark, Hadoop等7. 熟悉信号处理、优化算法、时序数据分析、深度学习等算法8. 3年以上工作经验优先条件：1. 工业专业教育背景或者工作经历（如自动化、机械、电气、石化、能动、电子等）2. 熟悉工业流程、工业通信协议，SCADA/MES/PLM等工业软件3. 了解精益生产、六西格玛等概念及相应数据分析工具

job_company: 东吴证券股份有限公司
job_given: 系统架构
job_detail: 工作职责:1、负责主导各类系统架构设计，核心功能代码编写工作，确保研发项目的进度和质量；2、负责系统性能及架构优化，主导技术难题攻关，解决各类潜在系统技术风险，保证系统的安全、稳定、高效运行；3、负责深入理解业务功能、系统链路和架构，能够快速排查和解决系统故障，并推动系统持续优化；4、负责新技术分析与学习，主导技术选型，通过技术创新业务，提升核心竞争力；5、负责指导研发工程师的产品开发和技术研究工作，解决各类技术疑难问题，形成良好的研发氛围，提升团队整体技术水平。任职资格:1、35周岁以下（含），全日制本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业，具有5年以上工作经验；2、独立承担过 2 年以上的软件项目系统架构设计与研究，有相关成功案例、大型系统软件架构设计、大型互联网公司核心开发及架构设计、重构者优先；3、精通设计模式，深入领悟系统服务的高可用、高安全、高扩展，并能给出解决方案，有过微服务架构（SpringCloud 、Dubbo）类似工作经验，精通 SOA 设计及治理理念；4、熟悉大规模系统的分布式、集群、负载均衡、缓存、消息队列、网络存储、网络安全、数据库高可用设计及性能评估机制；熟悉Linux常用操作、配置及命令的使用；5、具有 MySQL、Oracle分表分库的系统架构经验，具有 JVM 调优、SQL 调优经验；6、熟悉常见JavaEE开源框架（包括Spring、Spring Boot、MyBatis、Spring Cloud）、熟悉常用消息中间件、熟悉常见 NoSQL数据库的使用；7、具有Docker、Docker compose、k8s等容器化相关技术使用经验；8、熟练 Flume、Kafka、Spark、Hadoop、TensorFlow以及区块链等技术的优先考虑。

For example, we can derive the interests of the users based on studying on the user’s emails in a privacy protected environment and suggest the top important emails to him firstly every day. In this team, we will not only work on machine learning projects, but also online services and frontend experiences. Therefore, the developers in WPI team can experience a complete ship cycle for a commercial product. SDE2Responsibility:As a SDE2 in the team, you will be responsible for product features including most of the following parts: system architecture, frontend development, deployment, scale, performance aspects, from conception to delivery. We use multiple technologies and frameworks, especially in Big Data area - such like Spark, EventHub, .Net, and primarily code in C# or java. Distributed computation, high-scale, high availability, geo-redundancy, low-touch are all aspects that our features need to be designed with in mind.Qualifications:3+ years of experience in developing & creating platforms and services, a plus on Front-End development experiences.Strong proficiency in C, C++, C# or JavaExcellent design, coding, debugging and problem solving skills.Solid technical aptitude and take initiative, and must be result driven.Solid verbal and written communication skills in English.A BS/MS in computer science or related field.

job_detail: 微软全球安全研发团队在苏州招聘5+ 安全领域专业人才，如果有网络信息安全相关经验优先，若没有安全相关开发经验，对安全领域感兴趣亦可；Global 团队要求英文能够作为工作语言交流，有扎实的计算机基础知识。Are you looking for your next big challenge? Does the idea of protecting the most successful enterprise SaaS services in the world sounds exciting? Office 365 is the industry leader in hosted productivity suites and boasts to be the fastest growing business at Microsoft with more than 100 million seats hosted in multiple data centers across the globe. The Office 365 Security Team is chartered with the challenging mission of protecting Office 365 from malicious attacks and preserve its position the industry leader in Compliance.The Office 365 Security team is looking for a strong software engineer to help us in building and servicing challenging features across the spectrum in security engineering and monitoring. We are looking for an engineer who is technically strong, passionate about learning and growth, thrives in DevOps, and cherishes a collaborative team culture. You will be responsible to perform investigations and investments in complex areas; designing and delivering features end to end - including component design, code, test, deployment, live site telemetry and continuous validation, scale, performance and quality, from conception to delivery.Come and stretch your talent in a highly technical team in one of the hottest areas in tech. You will have plenty of opportunities to grow if you are a developer who is strong, excited about the space and eager to make a very big impact on the team, O365 and Microsoft.Qualifications- A degree in CS or similar- Experienced in using at least one of the major OOP languages: C++/C#/Java- Strong coding and problem-solving skills- Attention to quality and engineering excellence- Able to ramp up new technologies and new problem domains fast- Server and/or service experience is a plus- Experience and Familiarity with Internet Security, Big Data, Spark, Cassandra, Kafka, Machine Learning, Networking a big plus

job_detail: 工作职责:1. 基于海量用户行为数据，建立、评估、持续优化数据模型，包括但不限于：用户价值评分、用户风险评分、偏好分析及路径分析、用户画像构建等等，产出用户标签；2. 深入挖掘用户的行为与偏好，建立标签体系和用户画像，并对数据进行跟踪分析，验证标签效果，完善用户画像体系，运用数据赋能业务发展；3. 负责对数据的分析和解读以及定性和定量分析，准确定位业务问题和原因、发现变化规律、挖掘潜在业务价值，独立编写分析报告，提出解决方案并跟进落地；任职资格:1. 985/211院校本科以上学历，统计学、计算机学、数学等相关专业；3年以上工作经验；（学历不符者请勿投递）2. 精通数据分析软件，比如Python、spark、Hive、SQL；3. 能够独立完成需求抽象，数据摸底、特征工程，数据常规建模，业务落地过程，具有海量数据处理和挖掘经验；4. 熟悉数据挖掘的常用算法，灵活应用逻辑回归、聚类、随机森林、朴素贝叶斯算法、SVM等算法；；5. 有客户数据模型建立和运营经验、数据化运营经验，熟练独立编写商业数据分析报告，发现和分析其中隐含的变化和问题；公司介绍：斐波那契信息技术有限公司是面向企业的大数据智能技术服务商，我们的宗旨是： 为企业唤醒数据价值。斐波那契致力于为客户提供智能的大数据分析和营销平台及产品， 帮助客户挖掘潜在客户，精准营销，把控风险。 斐波那契以“数据中台”为核心战略，将建成以数据科学家，数据产品专家、数据处理专家为核心的技术团队。核心团队成员来自IBM、eBay等大型to-B 和互联网企业，拥有大数据和技术多年实战经验。

job_detail: 岗位职责1、参与大数据基础设施、数据标注平台等产品的建设，为自动驾驶研发提供稳定高质量的数据服务。2、持续的性能优化和架构升级，不断提升团队效率和产品的用户体验。3、结合业务和数据场景，提出专业合理的可视化方案建议，并推动可视化技术产生更多的业务价值。4、提供全栈场景，不设边界。 任职条件1、计算机、自动化、信息工程等相关专业，本科及以上学历。2、熟悉Javascript，有扎实的前端技术和计算机基础，包括但不限于 HTML / CSS / JavaScript / DOM / Http /数据结构等。3、精通至少一门 MVVM 框架，如 AngularJS/Vue/React，使用 React 开发过大型项目或者复杂单页面应用者优先。4、熟练掌握 SVG / Canvas / WebGL 等前端绘图技术及标准，至少使用过一个数据可视化类库，包括但不限于 D3 / G2 / Three.js / ECharts / Highcharts，有一定计算机图形学基础的优先。5、对技术充满好奇心，乐于学习，愿意分享，具备良好的服务意识，责任心，团队沟通和协作能力、发现并解决问题的能力。6、掌握至少一门服务端编程语言，并有实战经验，熟悉 NodeJS / Python 者优先。7、有过大数据产品（Hadoop / Hive / Spark 等）相关开发经验者优先。8、有移动端开发经验并且有实际性能优化案例者优先。9、有自己的技术产品、开源作品或活跃的开源社区贡献者优先。 加分项：1、有Linux或Ros开发经验。2、有岗位相关高水平学术论文发表。3、在Github或其他开源平台上有岗位相关的高质量项目。

job_company: 微软（中国）有限公司
job_given: 快速扩张，国际化视野，一流人才梯队
job_detail: WpI team is a product team in M365 of Microsoft. We are providing value-added services based on the user’s data in the compliant boundary. For example, we can derive the interests of the users based on studying on the user’s emails in a privacy protected environment and suggest the top important emails to him firstly every day. In this team, we will not only work on machine learning projects, but also online services and frontend experiences. Therefore, the developers in WpA team can experience a complete ship cycle for a commercial product.Data ScientistResponsibilityYou will be responsible to execute on the team’s Machine learning efforts as we aim to extract intelligence from user interactions and contents in a compliant boundary.·       You will go deep on a range of tasks including data mining, data annotation, and language processing.·       You will help establish and implement data pipelines.·       You will have ample opportunity for cross group collaboration, technical product definition and applied research.·       You enjoy being part of a collaborative, multidisciplinary team.·       You will mentor graduate student interns.·       You bring curiosity, a strong entrepreneurial spirit, and passion to deliver on the promise of technology in a difficult, competitive, and exciting vertical. QUALIFICATIONS: BS, MS or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics or related field3+ years working on production ML data pipelines2+ years of one or more of: named entity recognition, topic classification, knowledge graphs.Fluency with recent NLP & ML advancements, e.g., bert, attention, LSTMs, etc.Strong coding skills in one or more of Python, C/C++, Java, Scala, C# PREFERRED: 1+ years with one or more of: NLTK, Stanford CoreNLP, spaCy, etc.3+ years with one or more of: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, CNTK, etc.3+ years with one or more of: Spark, HDInsight, Hadoop, MapReduce, etc.Participation in Kaggle or similar competitionsWillingness to be a “learn-it-all” and jump into any problem space
